content: row 3 chain 3 counts as 1dc 1dc in next chain 1dc in next st twice *chain 4 1sc in chain -american u s crochet space skip dc3tog 1sc in next chain space chain 4 1dc in next st 1dc in next chain twice 1dc on terms are used through- next st * repeat from* across turn out this pattern row 4 chain 3 counts as 1dc 1dc in next 4sts *chain 4 1sc in chain space 1sc in between the prev scs 1sc in next chain space chain 4 1dc in next 5 sts* repeat from* across turn measurements width 3 5cm 1 3 row 5 chain 4 counts as 1dc + 1ch skip 1st 1dc in next st chain 1 skip 1st 1dc in next st length 1 65m 65 *chain 5 skip next single_crochet dc3tog in next single_crochet chain 5 fp* repeat from * across turn *length can be adjusted row 6 chain 4 counts as 1dc + 1ch skip 1ch work fp across i e making on the 5ch space a total of 2dcs end with a double_crochet on last st cut yarn and fasten_off weave in ends abbreviations hk - hook blocking giving a blocking to your garment will help the stitches to settle and st s - stitch es give the final shape and structure to your piece it is recommended to wet block otherwise give a gentle block with a steamer and cotton fabric in-between hold chain - chain your iron a few inches away never iron directly into your stitches chain space - chain space single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet dc3tog - 3 double_crochet together 6 skip - skip repeat - repeat 5 prev - previous ** - repeat between stars 4 - read instructions as a group 3 chain single_crochet 2 1 double_crochet dc3tog i-cord chain 16 sts the polisher 2024
